data.Title: Google Search Ranking Volatility Remains High
data.Description: RustyBrick observes ongoing high volatility in Google Search rankings and provides updated charts illustrating the trend.

data.Title: Upcoming Google Core Update Expected Soon
data.Description: Google Search ranking algorithm update and volatility heating up and we are expecting a core update soon(ish) - what are you all noticing?

data.Title: Google Merchant Center Next Rolls Out to All Merchants
data.Description: Google Merchant Center Next now rolling out to all merchants this month

data.Title: Google Ends Notes Search and Discover Labs Experiment
data.Description: ICYMI: Google ends its Notes Search and Discover labs experiment

data.Title: Google Confirms Ranking Boost for Country Code Domains
data.Description: This article reports on Google's confirmation that country code domain names receive a ranking advantage in localized search results, emphasizing the importance of ccTLDs for international SEO.

data.Title: Google's John Mueller Offers Advice on Evaluating SEO Agencies
data.Description: This article summarizes Google's John Mueller's advice on evaluating the effectiveness of an SEO team, emphasizing transparency and measurable results.

data.Title: Google Chrome May Simplify Product Comparisons with AI
data.Description: Glenngabe points to potential changes in product review and comparison SEO with Google Chrome exploring an AI-powered feature to simplify product research.

data.Title: Google is Automatically Translating Pages in Search Results
data.Description: Google is automatically translating pages in search results for some users, including the title link and snippet. When those users click through to your site, the page is also translated.

data.Title: Google's "GoogleOther" Crawler Explained
data.Description: GoogleOther is a generic crawler that may be used by various product teams for fetching publicly accessible content from sites. For example, it may be used for Google Search, Discover, and Assistant.

data.Title: Chrome to Display Full-Page Warnings for "Risky" Downloads
data.Description: Chrome will start showing full-page warnings for "risky" downloads soon. The new full-page "download warning" introduced in recent Chrome builds gives users a chance to restore the aborted download process, although Google is asking for a reason.

data.Title: Teads and Outbrain Rumored to Merge
data.Description: The latest installment of ad tech M&A activity is leaving some industry folks surprised.
